tooltip.warpedmod.magic_mirror.tooltip:
Teleports the player to their spawn point
Costs 1 level for every 250 blocks
tooltip.warpedmod.magic_mirror.tooltip_w:
Cannot be used if the player hasn't set their spawn point
Cannot be used across dimensions
tooltip.warpedmod.celestial_mirror.toolt:
Teleports the player to their spawn point
Costs 1 level for every 500 blocks
Costs 3 levels for travelling across dimensions
tooltip.warpedmod.celestial.tooltip_warn: Cannot be used if the player hasn't set their spawn point
tooltip.warpedmod.abyssal_mirror.tooltip:
Teleports the player to their spawn point
Costs no XP to use
Cannot be used if the player hasn't set their spawn point
info.warpedmod.mirrors.missing_or_invali: You gazed into the mirror, but there was nothing on the other side...
info.warpedmod.mirrors.wrong_dimension: You gazed into the mirror, but you couldn't see home...
info.warpedmod.mirrors.insufficient_leve: You gazed into the mirror, but the reflection seemed distant...
